Data Fields
EDMA_4K_errata_check_t_ Struct Reference
EDMA Driver Internal Data Structures

Flags related to checking of 4K silicon errata. More...

Data Fields

bool isEnableCheckInConfigAPIs
 Set the flag below to true(=1) to enable 4k checking during the processing of EDMA_configChannel and EDMA_configParamSet APIs. Error code EDMA_E_SILICON_ERRATA__4K_DATA_INTEGRITY_VIOLATION_OR_HANG_POSSIBLE_ERROR will be returned if data integrity violation happens. If isReportErrorOnExtraRead was true(=1), then an extra read only (no data integrity fail) violation will return error code EDMA_E_SILICON_ERRATA__4K_EXTRA_READ_ERROR. Note enabling this flag may have an adverse impact on processing efficiency if any of the config APIs mentioned above are involved in real-time processing path.
 
bool isEnableCheckInSetSourceAddressAPI
 Set the flag below to true(=1) to enable 4k checking during the processing of EDMA_setSourceAddress API. Error code EDMA_E_SILICON_ERRATA__4K_DATA_INTEGRITY_VIOLATION_OR_HANG_POSSIBLE_ERROR will be returned if data integrity violation happens. If isReportErrorOnExtraRead was true(=1), then an extra read only (no data integrity fail or hang possibility) violation will return error code EDMA_E_SILICON_ERRATA__4K_EXTRA_READ_ERROR. Note this check may have an adverse impact on processing efficiency because the EDMA_setSourceAddress API was created for efficient change of source address only during real-time processing.
 
bool isReportErrorOnExtraRead
 Set the flag below to true(=1) to enable reporting error for extra read. Note when extra read only error is reported, it means there is no data integrity violation or hang possibility. More...
 

Detailed Description

Flags related to checking of 4K silicon errata.

Field Documentation

bool EDMA_4K_errata_check_t_::isReportErrorOnExtraRead

Set the flag below to true(=1) to enable reporting error for extra read. Note when extra read only error is reported, it means there is no data integrity violation or hang possibility.

When data integrity violation happens or there is possibility of hang, extra reads are possible, these errors are always reported
